experiment_name: Expanding the Reactivity of Flavin Dependent Halogenases Toward Olefins via Enantioselective Intramolecular Haloetherification and Chemoenzymatic Oxidative Rearrangements
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:room temperature;    reaction_ph:7.5;    reaction_other_conditions:5 mM NaBr, 20 mM glucose, 1 mM glutathione, 35 U/mL catalase, 2.5 μM RebF, 9 U/mL GDH, 50 μM FDH, 18 h reaction time;    reaction_substrate_concentration:1 mM
